items.sentence: A dog that barks all the time doesn\'t make a good watch dog.
Am I really the only one here who doesn\'t understand French?
I forgot to tell you what time the meeting\'s going to start.
Tell Tom I\'m not interested in the car he\'s trying to sell.
Tom warned Mary that John would try to borrow money from her.
Tom was only three years old when he first came to Australia.
Tom was shot through the heart with an arrow from a crossbow.
Tom will have no problem getting the report finished on time.
Tom wishes he could speak French as well as a native speaker.
Tom listened to the sound of the waves crashing on the beach.
